website_summaries.verdict: If pumps aren't your thing, these cuffed sandals may fit the bill ... if the bill fits your budget.
pros: Full grain leather upper with ankle cuff and open toe
Ankle cuff features goring, horizontal slits and zipper closure
Comes in beta grey oyster, black oyster, luggage oyster and platino distressed foil suede
Suede lined footbed with foam padding

customer_reviews.title: Easy to walk in and easy on the eyes... ;-)
customer_reviews.text: These are stylish, comfortable sandals that can be dressed up or down. They go as well with long, full skirts as they do with rolled up jeans, and are very comfortable to walk in. I’m especially glad that the broad toe-strap is wide enough to accommodate the bunions on both of my feet. I had almost given up on all sandals that didn’t have thongs or toe-rings. So glad I discovered this brand! I’m looking forward to wearing these all summer and into the fall. Liked these so much I bought a second pair in black, and they’re my new go-to sandals for work and going out.
customer_reviews.author: T. Fulton

customer_reviews.title: Quality and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I loved the shoes ..so much..but i had to send them back twice..it appears this company make shoes for people with small and narrow feet only...but the quality of the shoe ..i give a 10!! but i couldn't find nothing in their product line to fit..because the shoes was all to narrow and tight across the top..i order twice and sent back twice ..i think but perfect shoes but they are design for narrow small feet
customer_reviews.author: sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Unusual color - great accent!
customer_reviews.text: Color is much more periwinkle than blue (blame my screen?) however the footbed is nice and soft, chunky heel is right on trendy and overall the shoe is comfy! I wear a 7.5 and it is a slightly wider fit than some of my other Sofft styles. I wear this with jeans & Ts as well as with summer dresses.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne M. Gundlach

customer_reviews.title: Color not correct.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe described as a denim color actually is purple . Cost $5.95 to return.
customer_reviews.author: Larry G

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable right out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: Soft materials, just like the brand name. No wearing them in, waiting for them to soften up and get comfortable. Fit right out of the box. The color is just like the picture, really nice. Fit was perfect for my size 11M feet. The insole is com-fort-able. Fast becoming my favorite summer sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Marra Rees

customer_reviews.title: I RECOMMEND! BUT THE PRICE HURT MY POCKETS !
customer_reviews.text: PRETTY SANDALS, TRUE TO SIZE ! I LIKE THE PERIWINKLE COLOR , HEEL HIGHT IS GOOD , VERY SOFT GOOD QUALITY LEATHER ! STEEP PRICE !
customer_reviews.author: SHOE A HOLIC !!!

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and lots of compliments
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and lots of compliments. It might be a little wide on my foot to look at but it doesn't slip around and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Judith H. Wiles

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoes..But for some reason, the right shoe very uncomfortable 😣..May it was mistake they did in the factory... I paid all this money I can’t wear it.. I will not buy it again
customer_reviews.author: justinah Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are very comfortable and are super cute on your feet!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoes. Unfortunately the weave that goes across my feet is not comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: deirdre

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these!
customer_reviews.text: These were incredibly comfortable right out of the box. Soft leather, great support, not too high of a heel. Looks edgy and on trend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S.

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are awesome. Sofft make the most comfortable shoes. The fit is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Shari Goscinak

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes!!! These are my second pair, I also have them in black!! They are so comfortable and super stylish!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Gullett

customer_reviews.title: Great Sexy Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Good looking sexy shoe! The fit is great! These shoes can be worn with skirts or jeans! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: The shoe was not made well. Quality was lacking. Thus it was returned.
customer_reviews.author: John P Healy

customer_reviews.title: Cute & comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! I get tons of compliments on them and they are so comfortable. I have 3 other pairs of Sofft shoes - love them all. True to size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, stable, stylish.
customer_reviews.text: love these shoes, I'm over 50 and 5'9". the heel width and supportive ankle strap along with the flexible soft cork sole with non slip surface makes these comfortable and still stylish. I only just received them but have put them on several times and walked around the house. I feel younger wearing them and will not be afraid to take them for a longer walk without a back up. very comfortable, no hard rub spots. I'm looking for more like these now in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Wenis

customer_reviews.title: Dressy and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about it. I bought these sandals in 5 colors!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara V Currid

customer_reviews.title: Perfect heel...ankle not adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I really like this shoe. They are really comfortable and I wore them all day the first time. The reason I gave it 3 stars is because I wish that they made the ankle adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: J&L

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. The leather is really soft. They are very comfortable and cute.
customer_reviews.author: BunnyBee

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and comfortable. I get a lot of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. V

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy! Love these! Wore them all day at work first day, feet felt fine all day. Great support, well padded ball of foot.
customer_reviews.author: Walters in Medford Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Runs A Little Small
customer_reviews.text: Other than being SLIGHTLY on the small side of the stated size, this is a top notch shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Identical to store shoes
customer_reviews.text: Saved $10.00 over retail store price and they fit better than the stretched out pair at my local shoe store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love These Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love Sofft shoes and these are no exception. They are so cute and I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes and even bought a pair for my Mom. They are cute, stylish and can easily be worn with a casual dress, jeans, shorts, etc. The best part is that they are incredibly comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: BargainHunter

customer_reviews.title: Great for shorter legs, and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I have been eyeing the TOMS sandal that’s similar but wanted this lower heel. Wore them the first day and friends noticed and complimented me on them. I’m really a function & practicality junky, and trendy in certain areas. Shoes are hard to be so trendy unless they’re a style that sticks. Which these are. I’m a petite curvy and most of these cute sandals go too high up on my ankle and form a kankle (haha). These are flattering. I did notice that the left part of my big toe is really sore—is it the shoe? Or something else? Time will tell! I want the black pair too!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Had high hopes
customer_reviews.text: I looked at these shoes Amazon, but I was concerned if they didn’t fit or if they hurt my feet I would not be able to return them, I did submit a question but nobody could answer if These shoes had free returns. . So I purchased them on anotherwell known site with guaranteed free returns. So glad I did. The shoes are very cute, hurt my feet. I amused to Dansko shoes, the sole on this shoe is way tooo soft. There is no support for the ball of the foot. I am looking again for a nice supportive sandal.
customer_reviews.author: PDS

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy as I'd hoped
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, cushioned footbed, beautiful style. The chambray color is a beautiful, versatile color. The fit is true to size and just right.
customer_reviews.author: B. Havin'

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! I decided to wear them around the house a little while to make sure my feet didn't hurt, VERY COMFORTABLE! I could walk in these shoes all day.
customer_reviews.author: Kec

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect color and fit. Very comfortable. Will wear these all summer long!
customer_reviews.author: jj

product_meta.title: Sofft - Womens - Milan
product_meta.description: An exotic, one-of-a-kind sandal with bold side zip.
feature_bullets: Offered in full-grain leather or distressed metallic suede
TPU outsole with a stacked heel
Molded cork insole and suede lined footbed with soft foam padding
Heel height: 2 1/2 inches with a 3/4 inch platform
